markdownRemark.html:
Ben Forta has responded to the Mary Brandel piece on ColdFusion being dead.

In his response, he mentions that Computerworld has refused to hear from Adobe or listen to their side. All in all, sounds like Shoddy journalism from Computerworld.

frontmatter.title: Ben Forta responds to the Computerworld's shoddy journalism
Ben Forta's keynote heavy on Flex
